channel.title: [Frontier] Firewall Trouble
channel.description: i have done everything to set up my server except i can't figure out how to make an exception in my firewall. I have frontier so for some reason my router doesn't have a security tab when you right click and select properties it just has the name of the router and the router web page and stuff like that... I went on-to my default gateway thing to see if i could create an exception in the firewall thru the webpage and i couldn't figure out what to do does anyone elsthe e use frontier internet?? if so how did u make your server im using the Shard Revolutions Server. Thanks

item.title: [Frontier] Firewall Trouble
item.dc:creator: @Pkmasterpwnz Pkmasterpwnz
item.description:
@Pkmasterpwnz wrote:

yeah but on the tutorial to make a rs-ps it says u want to make an exception in the router firewall and it told me to go to computer click on network (because i have windows 7) and then go to your network infrastructure and then go to settings and add the exception… i have a SpeedStream router and for some reason that Settings tab doesn’t show up… i have frontier is there a way i can go to my default gateway page and do this???

Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: [Frontier] Firewall Trouble
item.dc:creator: @Bellend Bellend
item.description:
@Bellend wrote:

that’s because you want to add an exception on your router firewall not your windows firewall(although doing this might help)

Read full topic
